title: A field of poppies
full_description: You are in a field of poppies. The smell of the poppies is intoxicating.

title: A house
full_description: You are standing outside of a small cottage.

paths.description: You see a field of poppies.
There is a door that is slightly ajar.

title: The front porch of the cottage
full_description: You are standing on the porch of the small cottage. You can see a faint glow through the crack in the door. You detect a faint smell of garlic

paths.description: you see a small yard immediately in front of the cottage.
